channel.title: 667 npc help
channel.description:
I'm using a TixenX remake and I need to get the npc id's to move home, but because of the npc names being changed I don't know how I would get the npc ids, can anyone help and/or tell me how to make it show the npc id when I examine it
Thanks, Adam.
Wrong section, move please.

item.title: 667 npc help
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

Well just find out their coords for their spawning spot and then check your npc spawning files for what npc spawns at that exact spot?

Read full topic
